name: Bold Ceramic Petal Ring in Blue
description:
This handmade ring is made from white stoneware clay finished with a deep royal blue matte glaze. It holds a rich textured flower petal design, which is both elegant and abstract. It is then fastened onto a bronze ring, which is adjustable so fits all!

Ring face measures approximately 0.5".

Additional colors and sizes available - please contact me for custom orders. Wholesale prices are also available.

name: Bold Ceramic Bud Ring in Cream
description:
This bold ring is certainly a statement piece! It is handmade from white stoneware and fired with a glossy off-white glaze. It is fastened to an adjustable bronze ring, so one size fits all!

The bud measures approximately 1.75" in length and 1.25" across. While it is a chunky piece, it is quite lightweight!

Please contact me for additional colors, sizes and styles. Custom orders welcome. Wholesale prices are also available.

name: Ceramic Bud Pendant in Wood Setting with Moss
description:
This handmade pendant is made from white stoneware clay finished with a dark gray matte glaze. It holds a bold, dimensional textured floral bud design, which is both elegant and abstract. It is embedded in faux moss and set in an oval wood setting. Metal bail at the top allows it to be hung from a chain or leather strap. This is truly a statement piece!

Pendant measures approximately 1.5" x 2". Chain not included.

Additional colors and sizes available - please contact me for custom orders. Wholesale prices are also available.

name: Bold Ceramic Bud Ring in Red
description:
This bold ring is certainly a statement piece! It is handmade from white stoneware and fired with a bright red matte glaze. It is fastened to an adjustable bronze ring, so one size fits all!

The bud measures approximately 1.75" in length and 1.25" across. While it is a chunky piece, it is quite lightweight!

Please convo me for additional colors, sizes and styles. Custom orders welcome. Wholesale prices are also available.

name: Red Tattoo Ceramic Earrings
description:
These handmade, oval-oid stoneware earrings are finished in a glossy clear glaze highlighting a deep red, floral tattoo motif. These are both delicate and bold. Earring posts are sterling silver.

Earrings measure approximately 1".

For additional colors or custom orders, please contact me. Wholesale prices are also available.
